Lowcountry's Best BBQ Buffet
Our Menu 
Smoky, Saucy, and Served to Perfection
Catering 
Get It While It's Hot
All specials 
Specials
ALL SPECIALS Skip Photo Gallery Where Southern Tradition Meets All-You-Can-Eat Perfection! about us 
Dukes BBQ in Charleston brings together tradition and flavor in a family-friendly atmosphere. Our all-you-can-eat buffet highlights the best of Southern barbecue, featuring classic SC mustard-based BBQ, chopped pork, fried chicken, and a variety of delicious sides like mac ‘n cheese and collard greens. Rooted in the teachings of the original Dukes of Walterboro, we take pride in our authentic recipes and signature style. Experience the genuine taste of Lowcountry cooking at its finest.
our menu 
Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Andy P:
five star review by 
Best all you can eat southern style food. Their hash and mustard sauce are legendary. Save room for banana pudding

Review by - Google

Daryl S:
five star review by 
One of my favorite places to go eat. Big Buffet selection. Foods always hot, fresh and tasty. I go at least once a month.

Review by - Google

Clark C:
five star review by 
Best comfort food in the area. Great variety of offerings. Limited inside seating, but worth the wait. Come hungry and leave happy!

Review by - Google

Meia M:
five star review by 
A great place to go for local dining. The buffet offers options that suit a most family style dining experiences with hearty sides and deserts. Solid choice but best at high volume times
